name: Lee The Chill Chinchilla
description:
Made for Little Awful Jam 2016 for the theme Chill.

This is Lee The Chill Chinchilla it's about a chinchilla called Chill Lee who is a Chill Chinchilla from Chile. This is probably the minimum requirements that is needed for something to be considered a Video Game I think.

In Lee The Chill Chinchilla you can:

  • Fly
  • Eat Chilis
  • Destroy Anime

Hatsune Miku gif was from deviant art.

Untitled Nonsense, After Dinner Jazz, and Dr Crafty's Better Fortress by mathgrant licensed under a Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States License.

Little Lily Swing by Tri-Tachyon licensed under an Attribution License.

Any other sounds/music was either bfxr or me fucking about with audacity.
